items.title: A (Micro) Blogging Reboot
items.content_html:
You may have noticed that I’ve re-enabled a bit of a blogging feature here on the site. It’s a micro blog. I’m using micro.blog to host the (micro) blog.

I’ve used micro.blog in the past and enjoyed it. I also like supporting small independent developers. I’m glad to be back.

I will not be bringing over any previous posts. You can get to those in the (archived) GitHub repo (blog.ryangrier.com). This is a clean slate.

The plan is to use this (micro) blog to post a mixture of short/long form posts.

When I had my previous blog going, I tried to focus on tech-related posts. That didn’t work out for me. I would post infrequently. I eventually gave up. I hope that a mix of short/long posts I’ll post a bit more.

We’ll see how this goes. Stay tuned?
